title: «J’ai une revanche à prendre» : avec le FC Versailles, Alexandre Mulliez prend son envol
snippet: Alexandre Mulliez en marge d’un match entre Versailles et Villefranche Beaujolais en août 2025. Icon Sport · PORTRAIT - Petit-fils du fondateur d’Auchan et membre de la famille Mulliez, le propriétaire du FC Versailles veut laisser sa ...

title: F1 driver Pierre Gasly invests in French third-tier football club FC Versailles - Sportstar
snippet: “With (co-owners) Alexandre (Mulliez) & Fabien (Lazare), we share values, ambition and a keen competitive spirit which will allow us to positively develop the club. This is the start of a very beautiful story.

title: FC Versailles 78 - Wikipedia
snippet: From August 2022 to January 2025, Versailles hosted their home matches in the Championnat National at the Stade Jean-Bouin in Paris, which they were renting for €30,000 per match.

title: Formula 1 driver Pierre Gasly becomes French football club's co-owner
snippet: Formula 1 driver Pierre Gasly has become co-owner of FC Versailles, a semi-professional French football club based near Paris.

title: r/formula1 on Reddit: Pierre Gasly becomes the 3rd partner owner of FC Versailles
snippet: FC Versailles is proud to welcome Pierre Gasly, French Formula 1 driver, as its third owner partner.
